text: I am bowed down with many iron bands, that I cannot lift up mine head Some authorities omit by reason of my sins.by reason of my sins, neither have I any respite: for I have provoked thy wrath, and done that which is evil before thee: The Alex. MS. omits I did... commandments.I did not thy will, neither kept I thy commandments: I have set up abominations, and have multiplied Or, stumbling-blocksdetestable things.
